healthy: healthy indoor houseplant leaf, uniform green color, no spots
foglia sana di pianta da interno, verde uniforme, nessuna macchia
powdery_mildew: indoor plant leaf with powdery white patches (powdery mildew)
foglia di pianta da interno con patina bianca polverosa (oidio)
leaf_spot: indoor plant leaf with brown circular spots and yellow halo (leaf spot)
foglia con macchie circolari marroni e alone giallo (macchia fogliare)
root_rot: indoor plant with drooping yellow leaves, soggy soil, possible root rot
pianta da interno con foglie flosce e gialle, terriccio zuppo (marciume radicale)
mosaic_virus: leaf with yellow-green mosaic pattern and vein discoloration (mosaic virus)
foglia con motivo a mosaico giallo-verde e nervature scolorite (virus del mosaico)
overwatering: indoor plant leaf yellowing uniformly due to overwatering, wet soil
ingiallimento uniforme da eccesso d'acqua, terriccio bagnato
underwatering: indoor plant leaf dry and curled edges due to underwatering
foglia secca con margini arricciati per scarsa irrigazione
light_stress: indoor plant leaf with sunburn: bleached or brown crispy patches
foglia con bruciature da luce, zone sbiadite o bruciate
nutrient_def: indoor plant leaf with interveinal chlorosis (nutrient deficiency)
foglia con clorosi tra le nervature (carenza nutritiva)
